entry.title: Anchor
entry.summary: Grounded in my roots Harness and transmute Bring light in to mother from above Surround her with eternal LOVE Running 'round Saturns rings Piscean memories Remembering how each one sings Ancient reverie Oh, Aquarian call from the deep Mass waking from sleep Humanities big leap…
entry.content:
Grounded in my roots

Harness and transmute

Bring light in to mother from above

Surround her with eternal LOVE

 

Running 'round Saturns rings

Piscean memories 

Remembering how each one sings

Ancient reverie

 

Oh, Aquarian call from the deep

Mass waking from sleep

Humanities big leap

 

All I know, is that I don't know nothing

To only my soul, do I look for certainty 

The song of the universe playing inside of me

Truth found in resonanceI found strength and remedy 

-Gabrielle Anastasia

entry.title: Virgo Full moon 2-26-21
entry.summary: This full moon is filled with alot of rebirth energy. Forcing questions like... The moon will bring ultra-focused energy boosts needed to get back on track. Affirmations:I am whole and completeI am safe All that is in my now is an opportunity to shiftI trust meI…
entry.content:
This full moon is filled with alot of rebirth energy.

Forcing questions like...

  • Am I sticking to healthy habits?
  • Am I staying on top of my responsibilities?
  • Am I taking the necessary steps toward divine will?
  • Am I fighting my mission?
  • What are these steps?
  • What is my mission? (if not already known)

 The moon will bring ultra-focused energy boosts needed to get back on track. 

Affirmations:

  • I am whole and complete
  • I am safe 
  • All that is in my now is an opportunity to shift
  • I trust me
  • I move through this
  • I am ascending
